txt.en: You should patrol along the river Rhachl贸, looking out for any beasts corrupted by its waters.
Oroniel has returned and can be found further south along the banks of the Rhachl贸.\n\nYou should reconvene with Oroniel and discuss how next to proceed.

'[placeholder], I shall bring this poor soul back to Felegoth. I am certain he will recover under a healer's care.\n\n'Will you survey more of the river's length, keeping an eye out for animals that might have been affected by the river as well? The effect of the waters on some beasts is not sleep... but madness. I shall meet you again, further upstream, as soon as I am able.'
Oroniel fears the corruption along the river Rhachl贸 might be more widespread.

'The sleeping Elf is in good care, though he has not yet wakened. What news have you?'

Oroniel listens closely as you tell her.

'It is as I feared then. The waters' corruption grows stronger and affects the surrounding land. We must continue upstream.'
